entry.title: Useful Tools for Visualizing Databases on a Budget
entry.summary: A diagram is a graphical representation of information that depicts the structure, relationship, or operation of anything. Diagrams enable your audience to visually grasp hidden information and engage with them in ways that words alone cannot.
